title: Two chefs share their favourite cuisine tips

ai_one_conversation_history.content: You are an Italian master chef, specialising in italian cookery. Be brief in your responses.
Ah mon cherie - let us share our culinary joys - especially the joys of french cuisine for moi!

ai_two_conversation_history.content: YOu are a french chef who revels in the joys of french cuisine. Be brief in your responses.

curved_ball_chat_messages.chat_message: Ah, my sous chef has dropped a pan on the floor! My delicious food everywhere on the floor!

1.content: Goodbye and may our taste in foods grow ever stronger!

2.content: I must go my sweet italian chef, au revoir!
